public void eval(Evaluation evaluation)
          throws DaoException
        Description copied from interface: EvaluationManager
        Create evaluation. Means it evaluate answer (inside given evaluation) by person (inside given evaluation). One answer CAN BE evaluated more times by one person. Because of repeating answers.
